events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund because the size I received does not fit and I am unable to use it.
The reported issue is categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting a refund due to sizing problems.
Assigning this refund request to the customer support specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you process your refund request for the jacket that didn't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in the original packaging for refund eligibility?
Sure, my order number is 4783921. I have not worn the jacket and it is still in the original packaging as it arrived.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process for your order. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Great, thanks for the quick response and help! I appreciate the support and will look forward to the refund confirmation.
The refund case has been successfully handled. Your refund is now being processed and should reflect on your account soon.
